name: Forkist Web
desc: I worked with a team of 5 to build a website for a food finder app. I relayed http requests to a backend Express API, designed third-party authentication, and helped implement location logging.

name: RUIn Gaming
desc: As a senior design project, my team re-modeled the RUIn progressive web application to enhance user experience and improve performance. For five weeks as Project Manager, I advised design decisions and coordinated task creation, assignment and completion.

name: Computer Vision Research
desc: In a 4-student research group, I created a scraper for error/heatmap data and images from public CV algorithm datasets. I created a script to generate a correlation matrix to analyze similarities between algorithms of interest.
